query: Do u have the email of SMITH?

choices.summary: The customer table stores information about customers who make purchases at the store. It is typically used for tracking customer details, managing customer relationships, and analyzing purchasing behavior.

columns.name: customer_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for each customer.

columns.name: store_id
columns.description: The identifier for the store where the customer made purchases.

columns.name: first_name
columns.description: The customer's first name.

columns.name: last_name
columns.description: The customer's last name.

columns.name: email
columns.description: The customer's email address.

columns.name: address_id
columns.description: The identifier for the customer's address.

columns.name: active
columns.description: Indicates whether the customer is currently active (1) or inactive (0).

columns.name: create_date
columns.description: The date and time when the customer record was created.

columns.name: last_update
columns.description: The date and time when the customer record was last updated.

choices.summary: The staff table contains information about employees working in a store, including their personal details and credentials. It is typically used for managing staff records and access within the system.

columns.name: staff_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for each staff member.

columns.name: first_name
columns.description: The first name of the staff member.

columns.name: last_name
columns.description: The last name of the staff member.

columns.name: address_id
columns.description: An identifier linking to the staff member's address.

columns.name: picture
columns.description: A URL or reference to the staff member's picture, if available.

columns.name: email
columns.description: The email address for the staff member.

columns.name: store_id
columns.description: An identifier for the store where the staff member works.

columns.name: active
columns.description: A flag indicating whether the staff member is currently active.

columns.name: username
columns.description: The username for the staff member's account.

columns.name: password
columns.description: The hashed password for the staff member's account.

columns.name: last_update
columns.description: The timestamp of the last update made to the staff member's record.

choices.reason: Has names but no email information.
choices.summary: The actor table stores information about actors, including their names and the last time their records were updated. It is typically used in databases related to film or entertainment to manage actor data.

columns.name: actor_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for each actor.

columns.name: first_name
columns.description: The first name of the actor.

columns.name: last_name
columns.description: The last name of the actor.

columns.name: last_update
columns.description: The timestamp of the last update to the actor's record.

choices.summary: This table stores information about various addresses associated with locations. It is typically used to manage and retrieve address details for customers or business locations within a database.

columns.name: address_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for each address.

columns.name: address
columns.description: The primary street address.

columns.name: address2
columns.description: An optional secondary address field, often used for apartment or suite numbers.

columns.name: district
columns.description: A geographical region or area associated with the address.

columns.name: city_id
columns.description: An identifier linking to the city associated with the address.

columns.name: postal_code
columns.description: The postal code for the address, if applicable.

columns.name: phone
columns.description: A phone number associated with the address, if available.

columns.name: last_update
columns.description: The timestamp of the last update made to this address record.

choices.summary: The city table stores information about various cities, including their unique identifiers and associated countries. It is typically used to retrieve city names and their relationships with countries for geographical analysis.

columns.name: city_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for each city.

columns.name: city
columns.description: The name of the city.

columns.name: country_id
columns.description: The identifier for the country the city is located in.

columns.name: last_update
columns.description: The timestamp of when the city information was last updated.
